name: Survive The Night (Concept)
description:
This is short ps1 style horror game made in SCRATCH!

=Lore so Far=

You have awaken in a house on a tall hill, and if jump down from the window you fall to your DEATH! So just try to escape ok? (It's BAD so far though...)

=How to Play=

There's Sanity but i doesn't work yet...

There's also Health but it doesn't work yet...

Press 'SPACE' to open the commands thing...

type "Search 'Object'" The object(s) are like bed or closet.

If you want and think something will happen again then just do "Search OBJECT again".

If you have a apple or anything EDIBLE just type "Eat Object" But if you want to chew gum the just type "Chew Gum".

They all gonna give less sanity more health.

=WIN=

Search, Search closet, Search Closet again, search bed, search window, search window again, search door, leave room...
